titles.title: To provide clarification in the reimbursement to States for federally funded employees carrying out Federal programs during the lapse in appropriations between November 14, 1995, through November 19, 1995.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 12/6/1995--Introduced. Amends Federal law providing further continuing appropriations for FY 1996 to reimburse States that have: (1) used State funds to continue implementation of a Federal program from November 13 through 19, 1995; (2) incurred expenses in the process of furloughing certain federally funded employees during that period; or (3) incurred expenses in the process of reimbursing such employees.
